data.field: values - return a list of the values in a hash

Returns a list consisting of all the values of the named hash. (In a scalar context, returns the number of values.) The values are returned in an apparently random order, but it is the same order as either the [perlfunc:keys|keys()] or [perlfunc:each|each()] function would produce on the same hash. As a side effect, it resets HASH's iterator. See also [perlfunc:keys|keys()], [perlfunc:each|each()], and [perlfunc:sort|sort()].
